DOC.brief_summary: The efficacy, safety and acceptability of a new artificial tear in subjects with dry eye will be compared to a currently-available artificial tear
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of an Artificial Tear for the Treatment of Dry Eye
DOC.criteria: Mild, moderate or Severe Symptoms of Dry Eye Uncontrolled systemic disease Use of systemic medications affecting dry eye Pregnancy or planning a pregnancy Contact lens wear
